瘮字的基本解释

瘮
shèn
见“瘆”。

瘮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shèn］
［《廣韻》踈錦切，上寢，生。］
“瘆1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。
(1)病而寒战。
(2)惊恐。

瘮字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　瘮； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页779第09
【集韻】楚錦切，音墋。駭恐貌。　又【廣韻】疎錦切【集韻】所錦切，?參上聲。義同。　又【玉篇】寒病也。　又【集韻】所禁切，音滲。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shèn］
["Guangyun" Ge Jin cut, go to bed, live. ]
"瘆1" in traditional characters. Also known as "1".
(1) Sick and chills.
(2) Panic.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　瘮; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 779 No. 09
[Jiyun] Chu Jinqie, sound change. Horrifying appearance.　[Guang Yun] Jiu Jin cut [Ji Yun] Jin cut, please refer to the sound. The same meaning.　[Jade articles] Cold disease also.　 Also [Jiyun] forbidden to cut, sound seepage. The same meaning.
